author: fwyzard
body:
Update the list of static and dynamic CUDA libraries included in the external
Update build rules for CUDA code:
  - drop CUDA_CFLAGS; instead pass all CXXFLAGS to the host compiler via `nvcc --compiler-flags '...'`
  - use a separate tool for each CUDA library
  - drop the `-lcudadevrt` flag for linking CUDA device code, and hardcode it in the SCRAM rules (see cms-sw/cmssw-config#60)

In GCC, reword '-Wa,...' as '-Xassembler ...' to support CUDA `nvcc --compiler-flags '...'`
title: Update CUDA 9.0.176 external and toolfiles
